prompts.oDataSourceTooltip: Select the OData service you want to replace
prompts.oDataSourceURITooltip: Enter the URI for the new OData source. The URI must start and end with '/' and must not contain any whitespaces or parameters
prompts.maxAgeTooltip: (Optional) Enter the time in seconds it takes for a cached response of the service to expire.
prompts.oDataAnnotationSourceURITooltip: Server side annotations have been detected for the selected OData service. If needed, enter a new annotation data source URI for the changed service. The URI must start and end with '/' and must not contain any whitespaces or parameters.
prompts.filePathTooltip: Select the annotation file from your workspace
prompts.addAnnotationOdataSourceTooltip: Select the OData service you want to add the annotation file to
prompts.oDataServiceNameTooltip: Enter a name for the OData service you want to add
prompts.oDataServiceUriTooltip: Enter the URI for the OData service you want to add. The URI must start and end with '/' and must not contain any whitespaces or parameters
prompts.oDataServiceVersionTooltip: Select the version of OData of the service you want to add
prompts.oDataServiceModelNameTooltip: Enter a name for the SAPUI5 model you want to use from the service
prompts.oDataServiceModelSettingsTooltip: If needed, enter any additional model settings in the "key1":"value1","key2":"value2" format
prompts.oDataAnnotationDataSourceNameTooltip: Enter a name for the OData annotation data source
prompts.oDataAnnotationDataSourceUriTooltip: Enter a URI for the OData annotation data source. The URI must start and end with '/' and must not contain any whitespaces or parameters
prompts.oDataAnnotationSettingsTooltip: If needed, enter any additional {{value}} settings in the "key1":"value1","key2":"value2" format

component.usageIdTooltip: Enter the component usage ID you want to add
component.nameTooltip: Enter the name of the component you want to add
component.isLazyTooltip: Select if the component should be lazy or not
component.tooltip: If needed, enter any additional {{input}} in the  "key1":"value1","key2":"value2" format
component.shouldAddLibraryLabel: Do you want to add a library reference?
component.shouldAddLibraryTooltip: Choose if you want to add library reference
component.libraryIsLazyTooltip: Choose if you want the library reference to be lazy or not

prompts.title: Title
prompts.subtitle: Subtitle

tooltips.title: Enter title for your SAP Fiori launchpad configuration
tooltips.subtitle: Enter subtitle for your SAP Fiori launchpad configuration
tooltips.icon: Enter icon path for your SAP Fiori launchpad configuration

validators.missingIconOrTitleOrSubtitle: At least one of the Title, Subtitle, or Icon fields must have a value.
validators.annotationFileAlreadyExists: There is already an annotation file with the same name. Please choose another file or rename the file and select it again.
validators.errorDuplicatedValueOData: An OData annotation or service with the same name was already added to the project. Rename and try again.
validators.errorDuplicatedValueSapui5Model: An SAPUI5 model with the same name was already added to the project. Rename and try again.
validators.errorDuplicateValueComponentId: A component usage with the same name was already added to the project. Rename and try again.
validators.errorDuplicateValueLibrary: A library with the same name was already added to the project. Rename and try again.
validators.errorDuplicateNamesOData: An OData Service Name must be different from an OData Annotation Data Source Name. Rename and try again.
validators.errorCustomerEmptyValue: {{value}} must contain at least one character in addition to '{{prefix}}'.
validators.errorInvalidDataSourceURI: Invalid URI. The URI must start and end with '/' and contain no spaces.
validators.appDoesNotSupportManifest: The selected application is not supported by SAPUI5 Adaptation Project because it does not have a `manifest.json` file. Please select a different application.
validators.ui5VersionNotReachableError: The URL of the SAPUI5 version you have selected is not reachable. The <URL> URL must be made accessible through the cloud connector and the destination configuration so it can be consumed within the SAPUI5 adaptation project and its SAPUI5 Adaptation Editor.
validators.ui5VersionOutdatedError: The SAPUI5 version you have selected is not compatible with the SAPUI5 Adaptation Editor. Please select a different version.
validators.ui5VersionDoesNotExistGeneric: An error occurred when validating the SAPUI5 version: {{error}}. Please select a different version.
validators.ui5VersionNotDetectedError: The SAPUI5 version of the selected system cannot be determined. You will be able to create and edit adaptation projects using the newest version but it will not be usable on this system until the system`s SAPUI5 version is upgraded to version 1.71 or higher.

error.appDoesNotSupportFlexibility: The selected application does not support flexibility because it has (`flexEnabled=false`). SAPUI5 Adaptation Project only supports applications that support flexibility. Please select a different application.

annotationFile.createTemplateFile: Create local annotation file from template
